Key Match Events: A disallowed goal in the first half after Phil Foden's cross was intercepted by an offside Phil Foden.
A late chance by Cole Palmer in added time, but the shot was too close to the goalkeeper.
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate faced scrutiny due to England's lack of goals in the group stage.
Slovenia secured their passage to the knockout rounds despite the draw.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's slow passing and lack of urgency in the match.
Substitutes Kobbie Mainoo and Cole Palmer showed promise but couldn't secure the win.
